Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: #20 buses temp. rerouted EB via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, Homan, and Madison; WB via Madison, Homan, Washington, Pulaski, and Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Hamlin due to a street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, and Homan, then resume their normal route on Madison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Homan, Washington, and Pulaski, then resume their normal route on Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: WB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, South Chicago, 92nd, Anthony & 87th, due to police activity near 87th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, South Chicago, 92nd, Anthony, then resume their normal route on 87th; due to police activity near 87th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
